project.description:
Stage a Scala distribution on sonatype using scripts/job/integrate/bootstrap. It builds locker and uses it to build and publish the required modules as well as the Scala compiler/library for this release, and generates an updated versions.properties that captures the modules/STARR used.

This job is run on every merge to publish a "nightly" snapshot, and on every tag, to stage a full release on sonatype.

Use github.com/scala/make-release-notes to build the release notes.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repo_user
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The github username for the repo to clone.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repo_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the repo to clone.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: repo_ref
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The git ref at ${repo_user}/${repo_name} to build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCALA_VER_BASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specifying this parameter will cause a release to be built. If it's empty (and HEAD does not have a tag that parses as a version), an integration release is built.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCALA_VER_SUFFIX
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Empty for a final release, otherwise, e.g., -RC1 for the first RC or -M3 for the third milestone. (Will be parsed from the tag on SCALA_REF, if any.)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCALA_BINARY_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For binary compatible releases (such as 2.11.0 and 2.11.1), the short binary version (e.g. 2.11). Otherwise, the full Scala version.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCALA_FULL_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For non-snapshot releases, the scala version, otherwise the closest scala version that's a valid binary version. Used to cross-version the scala continuations plugin.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STARR_REF
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Can be set to a git ref of a separate commit that will be used to build STARR, rather than using a prebuilt STARR based on starr.version in versions.properties. Used when bootstraping compiler changes that change the ABI, e.g. changing name mangling.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: XML_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scala-xml. If the version already exists, it won't be published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARSERS_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scala-parser-combinators. If the version already exists, it won't be published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CONTINUATIONS_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scala-continuations-plugin and -library. The plugin will be cross-versioned with SCALA_FULL_VER. If the version already exists, it won't be published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SWING_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scala-swing. If the version already exists, it won't be published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ACTORS_MIGRATION_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scala-partest. If the version already exists, it won't be published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARTEST_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scala-partest. If the version already exists, it won't be published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SCALACHECK_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version to build for scalacheck. Not published. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties (unless moduleVersioning != "versions.properties").

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AKKA_ACTOR_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version of akka-actors to include in scala-library-all.pom. NOTE: the release script will NOT build akka, the version specified here needs to be released already. If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: JLINE_VER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The version of jline to use for building the Scala project.NOTE: the release script will NOT build jline, the version specified here needs to be released already.If empty, it will be parsed from versions.properties.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: sbtBuildTask
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Leave empty to skip testing. Useful when publishing a nightly to run the community build against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: moduleVersioning
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to anything but "versions.properties" to build the latest HEAD for all modules.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: testStability
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to anything but "yes" to avoid running the stability test

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: publishToSonatype
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to anything but "yes" to avoid publishing to sonatype. Otherwise, release builds (tagged or SCALA_VER_BASE defined) will be published.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: integrationRepoUrl
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The repo where the build is published, requires a trailing `/`. Use https://scala-ci.typesafe.com/artifactory/scala-release-temp/ if the commit is not yet merged to scala/scala. Leave empty to use the default (https://scala-ci.typesafe.com/artifactory/scala-integration/).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: benchqTaskId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For Scala builds triggered by the benchmark queue, this parameter contains the `id: Long` of the task.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: jvmFlavor
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Java flavor to use (oracle/openjdk).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: jvmVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Java version to use (6/7/8).

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -ex if [ -f /usr/local/share/jvm/jvm-select ]; then source /usr/local/share/jvm/jvm-select jvmSelect $jvmFlavor $jvmVersion else echo "WARNING: jvm-select not present. using system default Java" fi
source scripts/jobs/integrate/bootstrap
